actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, to provide an annuity for the dependents of persons who perform the service required under chapter 67, title 10, United States Code, and die before being granted pay.

summary.text: Provides for an annuity for the dependents of members of the Armed Forces who perform specified service and die before being granted pay. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1437)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, to provide an annuity for the dependents of persons who perform the service required under chapter 67, title 10, United States Code, and die before being granted pay.
